title: 1978 40' Pullman Semi Truck Trailer with Contents
item_description:
1978 40' Pullman Semi Truck Trailer with Contents

Trailer Details

  • Year: 1978
  • Make: Pullman
  • Make per DMV: TRLMO
  • VIN: S36110
  • License: 1UN2618
    • Expiration Date: 6/30/1995
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 63,000 Lbs

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 480”
  • Overall Width: 96”
  • Overall Height: 162”
  • Deck Length: 477”
  • Deck Width: 94”
  • Side Height: 103”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: 11R24.5 16PR
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note: Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
